when I try to transfer a file into my external hard drive I get a permission denied message.. can someone help
you need to change the permisssion of the HDD, or format it to a filesystem that doesnt support permissions
The best way is to just chmod 777 it.
do you know where the HDD is mounted? it should be somewhere in /media
Okay, Now open a terminal, and type in 'sudo chmod -R 777 /media/sdc2/
chmoding it to 777 will allow everyone writing access to it
